name: .ODM File Extension
summary: Learn about .ODM files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open an ODM file in OpenOffice Writer (cross-platform) or LibreOffice Writer (cross-platform). To do so, select File → Open... from either program's menu bar and then open your ODM file.
You can also use OpenOffice Writer to export an ODM file as a single ODT file, after you've finished editing the ODM file. To do so, select File → Export... from the program's menu bar.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

images.caption: ODM file open in Apache OpenOffice Writer
